newsitem.title: THAILAND: INTERNATIONAL ENG SELLS ABCN SHARES.
newsitem.headline: INTERNATIONAL ENG SELLS ABCN SHARES.

text.p: International Engineering Plc said on Friday it would sell its 20.8 percent stake or 50 million shares in Asia Broadcasting and Communications Network Ltd (ABCN) to four firms for a total of 1.475 billion baht ($47.58 million).

The Thai company, which is a distributor of heavy machinery and telecommunications equipment, said in a filing to the Stock Exchange of Thailand that five million shares each would be sold to Hiraki Group Ltd and Kamery Ventures Ltd while another 20 million shares each would be offered to Mayflower Services Ltd and Mainland Resources Ltd.
ABCN is an communication satellite operator and has a total paid-up registered capital of $84 million.
